0: DALLAS - A man used a frozen armadillo to attack a 57-year old Pleasant Grove woman, Dallas police said. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR The incident happened on Sept. 29 in an apartment complex parking lot. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR According to investigators, the altercation occurred when the suspect was selling the carcass to the victim, who planned to eat the animal. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR The pair apparently began arguing over the price of the item when the man twice threw the armadillo at the woman.
